title: what grinds your gears?
body:
Title ^ and make it gameplay related of course, dumb feeders grind everyone's gears.

my gears grind when I see "support" champs like {{champion:63}}  and {{champion:143}}  smoking half the people in a team fight with 1 item and a runestone. another gear grind for me is the snowball effect when our "improved" assassins or an adc can chunk me for 1/3 of my health before you can say rip

replies.body: Bronze adc laning vs diamonds in ranked flex. when u are adc and ur support is bronze.
People who spam ping on me when something is happening in the present like let's say I'm getting ganked then fuckers start to spam carefull WELL YOU DON'T SAY BITCH! :O
placing my ward just outside the push

What grinds my gears are other gears.  Damn other gears, always wearing my gears down.

Now on to what actually grinds my gears, not much.  People playing Taric and using the edgelord skin.

well that is where you should be in favor of the new engine tech out there called free valve engines, its a camless engine .

really really mind blowing ... 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S3cFfM3r510

I hate it when I'm the jungler and we have a free or very very low risk dragon (like after we force a few people to back off) and I ping everyone to take it and nobody follows me and the enemy makes it back in time
there are no gears on league... its summoners ... what burns your summoners
